caption: The video tells the story of an astronaut father who has completed his mission with the project and is about to be reunited with his son. At this time, the son on Earth was caught by the police and sent to prison for stealing the keys and driving out. The son's grandfather went to prison to bribe his son out and ended up in prison. Grandparents and grandchildren because of this matter in the prison launched a fierce quarrel. At this time, a huge earthquake occurred, and several people escaped from prison.
